title: M5 on a torus and the three brane
abstract: We examine the D-3 brane from the point of view of the double dimensionally reduced M theory 5 brane on a torus. M-theory, IIB identifications are explicitly constructed and a possible reformulation of the D-3 brane is discussed. The duality transformation of the reduced 3-brane necessary to make the identification is discussed in detail.
